com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Interface IHAContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConfigurable, IRegisterable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HAContext

    public interface IHAContext
extends IConfigurable
    Defines the functionality exposed by the HA context to the rest of the application:
    • Method getClusterDefinition() provides access to the static definition of the cluster.
    • IClusterState methods provide a dynamic view of who is the primary node and who are the secondary nodes.
    • Method localNodeIsPrimary() tells whether the local node is currently the primary.
    • Methods localNodeCanBecomePrimary() and forceLocalNodeToBecomePrimary() are used respectively to check whether it is currently possible to force the local node to become primary and to force the local node to become primary.
    • Methods addPrimaryStatusEventListener(ICatalysEventListener) and removePrimaryStatusEventListener(ICatalysEventListener) are used respectively to register and unregister event listeners for local role change events.

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterDefinition

        IClusterDefinition getClusterDefinition()
        Returns:
        the static definition of the cluster

      • localNodeIsPrimary

        boolean localNodeIsPrimary()
        Returns:
        true iff. the local cluster node is the current primary node

      • isConfigMismatchAllowed

        boolean isConfigMismatchAllowed()
        Returns:
        Whether configuration mismatches are allowed within the cluster.

      • localNodeCanBecomePrimary

        boolean localNodeCanBecomePrimary()
        Tells whether is currently possible to force the local cluster node to become primary. There are a few reasons why this may not be the case:
        • If the local HA role determination state machine is still in the process of determining what the role of the local cluster node is.
        • If the local cluster node is already primary.
        Returns:
        true iff. it is currently possible to force the local cluster node to become primary

      • forceLocalNodeToBecomePrimary

        void forceLocalNodeToBecomePrimary()
        Forces the local cluster node to become primary.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if it is currently not possible to force the local cluster node to become primary
        See Also:
        localNodeCanBecomePrimary()

      • shutdownAllClusterNodes

        void shutdownAllClusterNodes()
        Shuts-down all the nodes in the cluster at the same time.

      • shutdownLocalClusterNode

        void shutdownLocalClusterNode()
        Shuts-down the local cluster node.

      • addPrimaryStatusEventListener

        void addPrimaryStatusEventListener(ICatalysEventListener listener)
        Adds a listener that will receive events (under the form of ClusterPrimaryStatusEvent objects) when the primary status of the local cluster node changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener for ClusterPrimaryStatusEvent events

      • removePrimaryStatusEventListener

        void removePrimaryStatusEventListener(ICatalysEventListener listener)
        Removes a registered listener of ClusterPrimaryStatusEvent events.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister
